rules_text: [i]Anticipate[/i] – {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: [i]Each day she played a subtle trick on Lord Glyris's mind, and each day lord Glyris remembered less about who he was.[/i]
